verses.name: Song of Songs 6:6
verses.text: Thy teeth are as a flock of sheep which go up from the washing, whereof every one beareth twins, and there is not one barren among them.

verses.name: Song of Songs 6:7
verses.text: As a piece of a pomegranate are thy temples within thy locks.

verses.name: Song of Songs 6:8
verses.text: There are threescore queens, and fourscore concubines, and virgins without number.

verses.name: Song of Songs 6:9
verses.text: My dove, my undefiled is but one; she is the only one of her mother, she is the choice one of her that bare her. The daughters saw her, and blessed her; yea, the queens and the concubines, and they praised her.
